checkpoints.name: Duffel service created
checkpoints.notes: Flight service audit complete. Duffel API working. 1702 results for LHR-DXB. API at /api/search/flights. Need to wire to package page UI.
checkpoints.evidence: curl returns real airlines (Gulf Air, Lufthansa, etc.) with real GBP prices

checkpoints.name: API returns real flights
checkpoints.notes: API returns real flights for 3 routes. Verified LHR-DXB returns 1702 real offers.
checkpoints.evidence: curl output shows Gulf Air, Lufthansa etc with real GBP prices

checkpoints.name: Airline selector wired
checkpoints.notes: Airline selector wired to live API. Shows FlightSkeleton while loading, error message on failure. Real airlines, times, prices displayed.
checkpoints.evidence: Build succeeded. useEffect fetches flights, groups by airline, picks cheapest per airline.

checkpoints.name: Flight details from Duffel
checkpoints.notes: Flight details show full real data from API including airport names, flight numbers, operating carriers, aircraft, cabin class
checkpoints.evidence: Build succeeded. Raw API segments mapped with departureAirportName, arrivalAirportName, operatingCarrier, aircraft

checkpoints.name: Price recalculates
checkpoints.notes: Price recalculates on flight switch. liveFlightPrice updates when different airline selected. Total = flightPrice + hotelPrice + activities. Shows 'Call for pricing' when either is null.
checkpoints.evidence: Click handler sets liveFlightPrice. calculateTotalPrice uses liveFlightPrice + liveHotelPrice.

checkpoints.name: Build succeeds
checkpoints.notes: Build succeeded with zero errors
checkpoints.evidence: next build completed. TypeScript compiled. 36 static pages generated.

checkpoints.name: 3 routes verified
checkpoints.notes: 3 routes verified: Dubai (1702 offers, Gulf Air/Lufthansa), Santorini (474 offers, Aegean Airlines), Bali (2692 offers, China Southern/Malaysia Airlines). All show real airlines, real prices, real times. No fake data.
checkpoints.evidence: curl tests confirm real airlines and GBP prices for all 3 routes. Build succeeds.
